mapper.sql: b.id, b.uid, b.level, b.region_id, b.status, b.update_time, b.update_by
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into td_branche_company
uid,
level,
region_id,
status,
update_time,
update_by,
#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update td_branche_company
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update td_branche_company set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
, u.uname as username
, c.uname as updatename
, d.name as districtname
from td_branche_company as b
left join td_user u on u.uid= b.uid
left join td_user c on c.uid= b.update_by
left join td_district d on d.id= b.region_id
where 1=1
and b.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and b.level=#{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and b.status=#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and u.uname like CONCAT('%','${searchName}','%' )
and d.name like CONCAT('%','${districtName}','%' )
